sentence.Network_en: Unlike nonspecific lightheadedness or dizziness, vertigo has relatively few causes.
sentence.Network_cn: 眩晕与头昏眼花及头昏情形不同, 是由一些特有的原因所导致的.

sentence.Network_en: This should not be confused with symptoms of lightheadedness or fainting.
sentence.Network_cn: 要注意分清楚这一点,以免把眩晕与头昏眼花、昏晕等症状混在一起.

sentence.Network_en: Palpitations due to an arrhythmia may be accompanied by weakness, dyspnea, or lightheadedness.
sentence.Network_cn: 由心律失常引起的心悸可伴有虚弱 、 呼吸困难或头晕.
